title: Android Developer
tagsAndSkills: Ui/Ux,Android Application Development,Product Development Life Cycle,Html/Css,java,Javascript,Android Studio,Cs

ambitionBoxData.Title: Luminous Power Technologies Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Qualification

  • Bachelors / Masters degree in Computer Science or similar

Experience

  • 2-3 years of relevant experience in Android
  • Working knowledge of platform specific development tools and environments
  • Experience of product development life-cycle and agile development methodologies
  • Experience of native platform libraries for performance optimization
  • Experience of Cross-platform development environment will be an added advantage
  • Experience in development of connected products is required.
  • Efficient in UI/UX design – user friendly, easy to load, easy to navigate
  • Experience in consumer-centric innovation and design thinking methodologies.
  • Experience in backend computing & API development will be an added advantage
  • Experience of App analytics is required
  • Proven track record in offer development and continuous engineering by interacting with own and cross functional teams/3rd party vendors to attain business goals encompassing superior quality, security & scalability.
  • Knowledge of design patterns and best practices
  • Extensive experience with testing and automation tools
  • Knowledge of AR tool will be an added advantage

Skills & Attributes

  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, proven experience in working with Design partners
  • Problem-solving skills with a sharp analytical mind
  • Capability to collaborate with cross functional teams/3rd parties
  • Understanding the business side of the App
  • An ardent researcher of market trends and technology evaluation

Job Description

Responsibilities

Processes:

  • Participate in the various stages of product development life-cycle (concept, design, development, deployment)
  • Translate design guidelines and concepts into working code
  • Produce modular, well documented, easy to maintain code
  • Debug and optimize existing products and code base
  • Perform unit and integration tests
  • Identify and resolve platform related issues
  • Create and test prototypes and provide feedback
  • Write, review and maintain documentation
  • Follow source control process

Technical Skills:

  • Java, Kotlin, JavaScript, React.js, React Native
  • HTML 5, CSS
  • OOPS fundamentals, Design Pattern
  • Android SDK
  • Database Management, SQL
  • Cybersecurity skill
  • JSON, XML
  • Firebase Cloud Messaging
  • Bluetooth & Wi-Fi based device configuration/integration
  • App Debugging Skill
  • Familiar with Design, Human interface guideline
  • 3rd party API integration e.g. Payment Gateway, Weather API.

title: Mobile App Developer
tagsAndSkills: continuous integration,Software design,GIT,MVVM,Healthcare,test driven development,MVC,Software services
jobDescription:
• Be part of an experienced development team to develop production-level mobile apps with large numbers of users.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
  • Collaborate and communicate with the client team.
  • Coordinate with internal team decide on using the best solutions architecture.
  • Working along-side other engineers and developers on different layers of the infrastructure.
  • Designing, building, and maintaining high performance, reusable, and reliable code.
  • Work independently in identifying and correcting bottlenecks and fixing bugs.
Skills Required:
  • Must have prior Android, iOS Flutter programming experience, Strong Knowledge of Flutter; Must have published at least 2 apps in the Apple/Google Store.
  • Solid understanding of the iOS/Android native and flutter-based hybrid mobile app development cycle.
  • Strong knowledge of the SOLID principle, MVC, MVVM, BLoC, Provider, software design patterns, Strong Knowledge of Swift and Dart.
  • Write well-structured, efficient, and maintainable code and actively keep the quality of the code; Writing clear, maintainable, and testable code.
  • Experience working in an agile development process; familiarity with continuous integration (CI/CD)
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.
  • Test Driven Development and test case writing Nice to have

Education: Graduate or Post-Graduate (Computer Science)
